questions.question: What is the primary purpose indicated on the label for this medication?
What is the name of the active ingredient prominently displayed on the label?
What is the dosage of the active ingredient in milligrams, as explicitly stated?
What is the stated form of the active ingredient in the provided label details?
What additional chemical name is specified for the active ingredient?
What is the descriptive term used to refer to information about the medicine?
What is the weight of the active ingredient in milligrams, according to the label?
What word describes the section containing information about the active ingredient?
What is the descriptor for the amount of the ingredient within a single unit?
What is the word used to describe the effect of this medicine?
What is the section heading on the label that specifies the medicine's role?
What word describes the listed components of the medication?
What is the word before 'ingredient' on the label?
What is the word that indicates that the information is about medication?
In what unit is the quantity of the active ingredient measured?
